guidelines.title: Common Technical Document (CTD) Quality Module Revision
guidelines.purpose: To improve submission and assessment efficiency for pharmaceutical quality data, enhancing lifecycle management and regulatory convergence.
guidelines.used_for: Structuring quality data in CTD for regulatory submissions, including complex products like biologics and advanced therapies.
guidelines.for_beginners: This guideline helps you organize quality data in Modules 2 and 3 of the CTD, ensuring clarity in QTPP, control strategies, and manufacturing processes.

guidelines.title: Quality Risk Management
guidelines.purpose: To provide principles and tools for quality risk management to ensure product quality during dossier preparation.
guidelines.used_for: Applying risk-based approaches in manufacturing, regulatory processes, and dossier documentation.
guidelines.for_beginners: Use this to identify and manage risks in dossier preparation, focusing on critical quality attributes for Module 3.

guidelines.title: Technical and Regulatory Considerations for Pharmaceutical Product Lifecycle Management
guidelines.purpose: To outline lifecycle management strategies for pharmaceutical products to ensure consistent quality.
guidelines.used_for: Managing post-approval changes and lifecycle updates in dossiers.
guidelines.for_beginners: This guideline helps you plan long-term quality management for drugs, useful for Module 3 updates.

guidelines.title: Continuous Manufacturing of Drug Substances and Drug Products
guidelines.purpose: To develop training materials for harmonized implementation of continuous manufacturing principles.
guidelines.used_for: Documenting continuous manufacturing processes in dossiers, especially for biotech and small molecules.
guidelines.for_beginners: Learn how to document continuous manufacturing in Module 3 for regulatory approval.

guidelines.title: Stability Testing Guidelines
guidelines.purpose: To streamline stability testing guidelines into a single, harmonized document addressing core principles and innovative tools.
guidelines.used_for: Ensuring stability data is properly documented in Module 3 for drug substances and products.
guidelines.for_beginners: This helps you include stability testing data in your dossier to prove product shelf-life.

sub_guidelines.title: Stability Testing of New Drug Substances and Products

guidelines.title: Analytical Validation and Development
guidelines.purpose: To revise analytical validation and development guidelines for improved regulatory submissions.
guidelines.used_for: Validating analytical methods for quality assurance in dossier submissions.
guidelines.for_beginners: Use this to ensure your analytical methods in Module 3 are robust and compliant.

guidelines.title: Specifications for New Drug Substances and Products
guidelines.purpose: To update specifications guidelines for harmonized, science-based approaches across various modalities.
guidelines.used_for: Setting quality specifications for drugs in Module 3, including biologics and advanced therapies.
guidelines.for_beginners: This helps you define quality standards for your drug in the dossier.

guidelines.title: Quality by Design and Risk Management Implementation
guidelines.purpose: To provide guidance on implementing Quality by Design (QbD), Quality Risk Management (QRM), and Pharmaceutical Quality System (PQS) principles.
guidelines.used_for: Applying QbD and risk management in dossier preparation and manufacturing processes.
guidelines.for_beginners: Use this to integrate risk-based and quality-by-design approaches in Modules 2 and 3.
